"Let’s see that again in an instant replay"

"Let’s see that again in an instant replay" — Astute dissection of the WatchKit SDK and San Francisco typeface, by Nick Heer. Particularly how the Apple Watch requires all animates to be prerendered and not done dynamically.

Published November 19 2014
